Introduction

This document provides an overview of the MailQ codebase, including its structure, key components, and interactions.

Key Components

  • API: Handles incoming email data and triggers classification.
  • Memory Classifier: The core engine that classifies emails using rules and AI.
  • Rules Engine: Contains predefined rules for email classification.
  • Vertex Gemini Classifier: Utilizes AI for advanced email classification.
  • Mapper: Converts classification results into Gmail labels.
  • Category Manager: Manages user-specific email categories.

Data Flow

Emails are received through the API, classified by the Memory Classifier using the Rules Engine or AI, and then labeled by the Mapper before being returned to the user.
